com.hannesdorfmann.mosby.mvp.viewstate.lce

Interface LceViewState<D,V extends MvpLceView<D>>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - the data / model type
    V - the type of the view
    All Superinterfaces:
    ViewState<V>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ParcelableLceViewState<D,V>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsLceViewState, AbsParcelableLceViewState, ArrayListLceViewState, CastedArrayListLceViewState, ParcelableDataLceViewState, RetainingFragmentLceViewState, RetainingLceViewState, SerializeableLceViewState, VoidViewState

    public interface LceViewState<D,V extends MvpLceView<D>>
extends ViewState<V>
    An LCE (Loading-Content-Error) ViewState is a viewstate that can save and restore loading, the content, or the error (exception).
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int STATE_SHOW_CONTENT
      Used as currentViewState to indicate that the content is currently displayed on screen
      static int STATE_SHOW_ERROR
      Used as currentViewState to indicate that the error is currently displayed on screen
      static int STATE_SHOW_LOADING
      Used as currentViewState to indicate that loading is currently displayed on screen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setStateShowContent(D loadedData)
      Set the view state to showing content
      void setStateShowError(java.lang.Throwable e, boolean pullToRefresh)
      Set the view state to showing the errorview
      void setStateShowLoading(boolean pullToRefresh)
      Set the state to show loading
